entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 March 2023
